items.q: What are the advantages of renting a court at BadminKuy?
items.a: You can see a complete list of fields with opening hours, ratings, locations, and manager contact details on one platform.

items.q: How do you reserve a court at BadminKuy?
items.a: Select a court, check the available times, then follow the booking instructions in the court details. Some courts can be booked directly, while others can be booked via WhatsApp.

items.q: How much does it cost to rent a court at BadminKuy?
items.a: Rental fees are determined by each field manager and can be found on the field details page.

items.q: Can I cancel or change my booking schedule?
items.a: Cancellation policies follow the rules of each field. Contact the manager via WhatsApp if you want to change the schedule.

courtForm.locTextChild: Tip: you can enter a place name or coordinates

Home.reserBadmin: Badminton court bookings can be made through the website or online.
Home.findBadminton: Makes it easy to find badminton courts in the Bekasi area.
Home.provideOnline: Provides online payments for customer security and convenience.
Home.descAbout1: BadminKuy is a badminton court booking platform that makes it easy for you to search, compare, and book your favorite courts online.
Home.descAbout2: We collaborate with various sports centers and badminton courts to provide a comfortable, practical, and transparent playing experience for all players, from beginners to professional athletes.
Home.featuredDesc: Get to know athletes who frequently play on BadminKuy
Home.communityText: Building badminton excellence and fostering a spirit of togetherness across the United Arab Emirates since 2025.
Home.descriptionPartners: Official dealers of world-class brands Yonex, Victor, and Apacs.
Home.descPremium: Successfully managing high-end sports complexes in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain.
Home.athltDesc: Developing athletic talent through structured training programs
Home.descRegion: Building a strong badminton culture across the UAE and GCC regions
Home.textMission: To promote an active lifestyle and enhance the sports experience through premium equipment, world-class facilities, and training by expert coaches. We are committed to developing talent and building a dynamic badminton community that inspires excellence at every level.

Auth.descForgot: Don't worry, that's normal. Enter your registered email address and reset your field rental account password directly on this page
